xwikidoc.title: Attachments Macro Translations
xwikidoc.content:
rendering.macro.attachments.name=Attachments rendering.macro.attachments.description=Displays the list of attachments for a given document using a live table. rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.document.name=Document rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.document.description=The document whose attachments are displayed. rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.limit.name=Limit rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.limit.description=The number of attachments to display per page. rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.order.name=Order rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.order.description=The order to use on the sort column. Accepted values: 'asc' and 'desc'. rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.sort.name=Sort rendering.macro.attachments.parameter.sort.description=The column to sort by. Accepted values: 'name', 'type', 'size', 'author' and 'date'.
rendering.macro.attachments.livetable.name=Name rendering.macro.attachments.livetable.type=Type rendering.macro.attachments.livetable.size=Size rendering.macro.attachments.livetable.author=Author rendering.macro.attachments.livetable.date=Date
